text:
Father's Day is just right around the corner! Have you thought of what to get your dad and the hubs yet? 😉

If you haven't. Perhaps you can browse through our newly-minted website to see if there's anything you think he might like. To celebrate the launch of our new site, we're letting you enjoy a 20% discount of all items listen under NomadX! 
Just quote, "ECM20", upon checking out to enjoy! Hope you gift your dad and hubs something nice! (:

Dear shandyyap, a heartfelt thanks for giving us a chance to serve you☺️ We are glad to hear that our nanny has made such an impact for you and your family. We will let her know that you were pleased with her service❤️Thank you!
